summary: This document is an email correspondence from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, expressing gratitude and friendship. Staley acknowledges Epstein's support and friendship, despite the accusations against him. The email emphasizes confidentiality and includes disclaimers regarding legal privilege and confidentiality.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is the sender of the email, expressing gratitude for the friendship and support he has received.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Staley is the recipient of the email, who acknowledges Epstein's impact on his life and expresses deep friendship.

connections.description: Epstein and Staley share a deep friendship, with Staley expressing gratitude for Epstein's support.

keyFacts: Jes Staley expresses gratitude towards Jeffrey Epstein for his support.
Staley acknowledges the accusations against Epstein but emphasizes their friendship.
The email contains confidentiality disclaimers regarding its content.
The email is marked as confidential and may be subject to attorney-client privilege.
